Verses: 1 appozhudhu Dhevaalayaththilirundhu Undaana Oru Perunjaththam Andha Ezhu Thoodharudane: Neengal Poi Dhevanudaiya Kobakalasangalaip Boomiyinmel Ootrungal Endru Sollakketten.

2 mudhalaam Thoodhan Poi, Than Kalasaththilulladhaip Boomiyinmel Ootrinaan; Udane Mirugaththin Muththiraiyaith Thariththavargalum Adhin Soroobaththai Vanangugiravargalumaagiya Manushargalukkup Pollaadha Kodiya Punnundaayitru.
3 irandaam Thoodhan Than Kalasaththilulladhaich Samuththiraththile Ootrinaan; Udane Adhu Seththavanudaiya Raththampolaayitru; Samuththiraththilulla Piraanigal Yaavum Maandupoyina.
4 moondraam Thoodhan Than Kalasaththilulladhai Aarugalilum, Neerootrugalilum Ootrinaan; Udane Avaigal Raththamaayina.
5 appozhudhu Thanneergalin Thoodhan: Irukkiravarum Irundhavarum Parisuththarumaagiya Dhevareer Ippadi Niyaayandheerkka Needhiyullavaraayirukkireer.

6 avargal Parisuththavaangaludaiya Raththaththaiyum Theerkkadharisigaludaiya Raththaththaiyum Sindhinapadiyinaal, Raththaththaiye Avargalukkuk Kudikkakkoduththeer; Adharku Paaththiraraayirukkiraargal Endru Sollakketten.
7 balipeedaththilirundhu Veroruvan: Aam, Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Ummudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugal Saththiyamum Needhiyumaanavaigal Endru Sollakketten.
8 naankaam Thoodhan Than Kalasaththilulladhaich Sooriyanmel Ootrinaan; Theeyinaal Manusharaik Thagikkumpadi Adharku Adhikaarang Kodukkappattadhu.

9 appozhudhu Manushargal Migundha Ushnaththinaale Thagikkappattu, Indha Vaadhaigalaich Seyya Adhigaaramulla Dhevanudaiya Naamaththaith Thooshiththaargaleyallaamal, Avarai Magimaippaduththa Manandhirumbavillai;

10 aindhaam Thoodhan Than Kalasaththilulladhai Mirugaththinudaiya Singaasanaththinmel Ootrinaan; Appozhudhu Adhin Raajyam Iruladaindhadhu; Avargal Varuththaththinaale Thangal Naavugalaik Kadiththukkondu,
11 thangal Varuththangalaalum, Thangal Pungalaalum, Paralogaththin Dhevanaith Thooshiththaargaleyallaamal, Thangal Kiriyaigalai Vittu Manandhirumbavillai.

12 aaraam Thoodhan Than Kalasaththilulladhai Aippiraaththu Ennum Periya Nadhiyinmel Ootrinaan: Appozhudhu Sooriyan Udhikkun Thisaiyilirundhum Raajaakkalukku Vazhi Aayaththamaakumpadi Andha Nadhiyin Thanneer Vatrippoyitru.
13 appozhudhu, Valusarppaththin Vaayilum Mirugaththin Vaayilum Kallaththeerkkadharisiyin Vaayilumirundhu Thavalaigalukku Oppaana Moondru Asuththa Aavigal Purappattuvarakkanden.

14 avaigal Arpudhangalaich Seygira Pisaasugalin Aavigal; Avaigal Boologamengumulla Raajaakkalaich Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevanudaiya Magaanaalil Nadakkum Yuththaththirkuk Koottichcherkkumpadikkup Purappattuppogiradhu.
15 idho, Thirudanaippol Varukiren. Than Maanam Kaanappadaththakkadhaaga Nirvaanamaai Nadavaadhapadikku Vizhiththukkondu, Than Vasthirangalaik Kaaththukkollugiravan Paakkiyavaan.
16 appozhudhu Ebireyu Baashaiyile Armakedhon Ennappatta Idaththile Avargalaik Koottich Serththaan.
17 ezhaam Thoodhan Than Kalasaththilulladhai Aagaayaththil Ootrinaan; Appozhudhu Paralogaththin Aalayaththilulla Singaasanaththilirundhu: Aayitru Endru Solliya Perunjaththam Pirandhadhu.
18 saththangalum Idimuzhakkangalum Minnalgalum Undaayina; Boomi Migavum Adhirndhadhu, Boomiyinmel Manushargal Undaana Naalmudharkondu Appadippatta Periya Adhirchchiyundaanadhillai.

19 appozhudhu Magaa Nagaram Moondru Pangaagap Pirikkappattadhu, Purajaadhigaludaiya Pattanangal Vizhundhana. Magaa Baabilonukku Dhevanudaiya Ukkiramaana Kobaakkinaiyaagiya Madhuvulla Paaththiraththaik Kodukkumpadi Adhu Avarukku Munbaaga Ninaippoottappattadhu.
20 theevugal Yaavum Agandrupoyina, Parvadhangal Kaanappadaamarpoyina.

21 thaalandhu Niraiyaana Periya Kalmazhaiyum Vaanaththilirundhu Manusharmel Vizhundhadhu; Andhak Kalmazhaiyinaal Undaana Vaadhaiyinimiththam Manushargal Dhevanaith Thooshiththaargal; Andha Vaadhai Magaa Kodiyadhaayirundhadhu.
